feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.38
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Convert portal menu store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15304
  • Typing frontend-core fetch apis by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15295
  • Convert portal OIDC store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15306
  • Convert portal organisation store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15307
  • Allow use of AI fields in view calculations. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15325
  • Delete old feature flags. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15320
  • Fix issue with forms after cleanup by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15332
  • Revert "Fix issue with forms after cleanup" by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15335
  • Explicitly fetch the data from fetch by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15336

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.37...3.2.38

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.39
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Convert grid libs to typescript by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15339
  • Fix close modal on grid+modal generation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15341
  • Typing notification store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15331
  • Typification of util schema by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15338
  • Convert queries store to typescript by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15340
  • account-portal login v2 feature flag by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15343
  • Fix wrong conversion for UserFetch by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15344

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.38...3.2.39

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.40
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix date-only searching. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15337
  • Convert portal user store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15327
  • Only select required columns from sql databases by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15169
  • Typing client api patches overrides by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15354
  • Fix query rows step when querying a table containing spaces in the name by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15346

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.39...3.2.40

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.41
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • S3Upload UI fixes by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15179
  • Type client utils by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15353
  • Remove DEFAULT_VALUES flag check by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15360

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.40...3.2.41

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.42
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Typing builder helpers by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15362
  • Re-add tests files in backend-core/dist by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15364

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.41...3.2.42
